  • Uses of geo_location in api

    Classes in api that implement geo_location 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  NodeData.GeoLocation
    inner implementation of "geo_location" class represent the 3D location of every node in the graph
    Methods in api that return geo_location 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    geo_location node_data.getLocation()
    Returns the location of this node, if none return null.
    geo_location NodeData.getLocation()
    get location method returns the location of the node in the graph
    Methods in api with parameters of type geo_location 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    double geo_location.distance​(geo_location g)

    method to calculate the distance between two locations

    Allows changing this node's location.
